sourcesContent:
import { DataService } from './../../service/data.service'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-acount', templateUrl: './acount.component.html', styleUrls: ['./acount.component.scss'] }) export class AcountComponent { profile:any; constructor(private DataService:DataService) { } ngOnInit() { this.load_profile() } load_profile() { this.DataService.post('/account/profile',{phonenumber:localStorage.getItem('phone')}).then((req:any)=>{ this.profile = req.result; }) } }
{{profile.fullname}}

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

  • Email:
  • Phone: {{profile.phonenumber}}
  • Address: 123 Main St, Anytown USA
